name: Time Flip
description:
Inspired by Terry Cavanagh's VVVVVV, Time Flip distorts and manipulates the common gravitational element of a traditional platformer. Embedded within Time Flip's 100 levels lie intriguing puzzles, hidden gems, and unique challenges. Time Flip's built-in level editor makes it easy to design and share levels of your own.

If you have any questions, concerns, or suggestions, don't hesitate to reach me at timeflip.game@gmail.com. I hope you enjoy my first project! ~Coby
